name: GravJam
description:
We spontaneously decided to partake in the Jam (a bit late, saturday afternoon) and it was a blast! Its my(Moritz) first Jam and we had no Graphics/Game designer but we hope to make up with clever game mechanics an beautiful music and sounds.

Hope you enjoy!

Tho this is still WIP we'll continue working on it ( esp. integrating sound :S)

The Game:

Oh no! You are a Wizard who messed with the fabric of the universe and are now stuck in a rift in the space time continuum. Gravity anomalies formed around you and you have to get back to your portal. Use your Philosopher stone. to activate altars, but be wise and don't lose them! Be careful of your surroundings, things might not be as they used to be!

Alternative Controls:

Arrowkeys, Left Mouse Button and Right Mouse Button

Hints:

red- heavy

yellow - medium

green - light

Place stones on altars to activate them. Only a stone with the right weight will activate the altar! Gravity zones affect you and your stones, use that to manipulate the weight of your stone.

Assets used:

Brackeys 2d Megapack

Pixel Font - Tripfive

Parallax Dusk Mountain Background

Huge shoutout to Brackeys and his endless ressources on unity <3 love you.
